description:
April 20, 2017 / Addendum host D. Watkins is joined by Undisclosed: The Killing of Freddie Gray host Amelia McDonell-Parry, as well as guest panelists Kinji Scott and Jayne Miller.
 
Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes, Ramiro Marquez, Blue Dot Sessions, and FMG Dez.

Thank you to our sponsors!!!
Hunt A Killer - huntakiller.com Promo Code: SOLVE
Upside - upside.com Promo Code: BIZTRIP
